name: Rex Center Vegas
address: 3528 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89169
description: Family fun center offering Mini Golf, Go-Karts, Laser Tag, Rock Climbing Walls, and Axe Throwing. Also features a pizza restaurant.
reviews: Great place for families with kids of all ages.
Unlimited go-karts and laser tag with a full day pass.
Perfect for birthday parties and family outings.

name: Las Vegas Mini Grand Prix Family Fun Center
address: 1401 N Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89108
description: Popular spot for thrilling go-kart racing, amusement rides, and arcade games suitable for kids and adults.
reviews: Kids had a blast racing go-karts.
Many rides and games for all ages.

name: Game Nest Arcade
address: 10998 W Charleston Blvd #20, Las Vegas, NV 89135
description: Arcade with a variety of games suitable for children and teens in a welcoming environment.
reviews: Lots of fun games for the whole family.
Kids loved the prizes and game variety.

name: John's Incredible Pizza
address: 8714 W Sunset Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89113
description: Family-oriented amusement center offering pizza buffet, arcade games, rides, and entertainment.
reviews: Great variety of fun for kids and families.
Pizza buffet was a big hit.
Lots to keep kids entertained for hours.

name: Canyon Cars
address: 7835 S Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89139
description: Indoor amusement park featuring go-kart racing, arcade games, and party rooms.
reviews: Safe and fun environment for kids.

name: Area15
address: 3215 S Rancho Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89102
description: Immersive entertainment district including interactive art, VR experiences, family-friendly activities, and dining.
reviews: A unique place with lots for families to do.

name: Electric Playhouse
address: 4480 Paradise Rd Suite 100, Las Vegas, NV 89169
description: Indoor interactive games and activities suitable for kids and adults, perfect for birthday parties.

name: Spy Ninjas HQ
address: 7400 W Sahara Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89117
description: Adventure park featuring escape rooms, virtual reality, trampolines, climbing walls, axe throwing, and arcade games.
